toc.envision_location: Eiffel ENViSioN!\Developing with Eiffel ENViSioN!\Adding a New Project\Advanced GUI Project Wizard\Interface Construction Page\How To's

paragraph.paragraph:
To remove an
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.xml#object object from your EiffelBuild system,
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.xml#pick_and_drop pick the object you wish to delete, and
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.xml#pick_and_drop drop it on
/images/eiffelbuild/icons/icon_delete_small_color.png in the
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/10_general_interface_description/20_main_toolbars main toolbar .

You may also delete via the keyboard by pressing the delete key while the tool containing the objects representation has the focus. Whichever ../../reference/02_notation.xmlobject has the selection is deleted.
paragraph.note: Note: To restore a deleted object, you may use the ../../reference/70_history/index.xmlHistory
